Action.Lua:
local bt = acGetMonitorBottom(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex < 80 or gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("@d") else -- acMinimizeWindow(nil, gsx, gsy) end
acMaximizeOrRestoreWindow(nil, gsx, gsy)
acSendKeys("%{TAB}")
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^c")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("{F_5}") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^a") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^v") end
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^x")

-- V2
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("{F_5}")

-- --
acSendKeys("%{F_4}")
acSendKeys("{DELETE}")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1)
if gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^+s") else -- acSendKeys("^s") end
acSendKeys("^f")
acSendKeys("^n")
acSendKeys("^{END}")
acSendKeys("^{HOME}")

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^y") else -- acSendKeys(" ") end
acSendKeys("{ENTER}")

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^z") else acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end
acDisableNext()
acSendKeys("^p")

-- V2 --
acSendKeys("%{F_4}")

Hotkey.Lua: -- The first call is made to ensure that if the ignore key is -- part of this hotkey definition, S+ maintains a proper tray -- icon state after the call to acDisable() is made. acDisableNext() acDisable()

Action.Lua:
local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) or gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("{F11}") else -- / acMaximizeOrRestoreWindow(nil, gsx, gsy) end
acSendKeys("^+t")
acSendKeys("^t")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local exe = acGetExecutableName(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("%{RIGHT}") elseif gsy > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^j") else -- acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 0, 1, 1) acDelay(300)
if exe == "iexplore.exe" then -- IE acSendKeys("w") else acSendKeys("t") -- Chrome end
-- end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("%{LEFT}") else acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end
acCloseApplication(nil, gsx, gsy)

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gey < (tp + 80) then -- ... acSendKeys("{F_6}") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^x") end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gey < (tp + 80) then -- ... acSendKeys("{F_5}") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^c") end
acSendKeys("{F11}")
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("{F12}")

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- / acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("{F_9}") end
acSendKeys("{F_4}")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^r") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^a") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^v") end
if gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^u") else -- acSendKeys("^b") end
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^%v")
if gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^e") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^c") end
if gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^l") else -- acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^r") else -- acSendKeys("{SPACE}") end

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^i") else -- acSendKeys("^x") end
acSendKeys("^e") acSendKeys("{DELETE}")
acSendKeys("^n")
if gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^u") else -- acSendKeys("^b") end

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^i") elseif gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("+w") else -- acSendKeys("^x") end

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy) local rt = acGetWindowRight(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then if gsx < (rt / 2) then -- acSendKeys("{F_2}") else -- acSendKeys("{F_4}") end elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^a") else -- acSendKeys("^v") end
if gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^+r") else -- acSendKeys("^r") end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("^{ENTER}") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "2", 1) acSendKeys(" ") end
if gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^e") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^c") end
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^e}")
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("{ESC}") acSendKeys(":w") acSendKeys("{ENTER}")
if gey > 80 then -- acSendKeys("{ESC}") acSendKeys(":q") acSendKeys("{ENTER}") else -- acSendKeys("%{F_4}") end

acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 2, 1, 1) acMouseMove(gex, gey)
acSendKeys("22") acSendKeys("{ENTER}")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 2, 1, 1) acMouseMove(gex, gey)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("23") acSendKeys("{ENTER}") elseif gsy > (bt - 100) then -- / acSendKeys("{F12}") else -- K acSendKeys("{F_5}") end

acMouseClick(gex, gey, 2, 1, 1)
if gey > 80 then acSendKeys("{ESC}") else -- acSendKeys("%{F_4}") end

acMouseClick(gex, gey, 2, 1, 1)
acSendKeys("{PGDN}")

acMouseClick(gex, gey, 2, 1, 1)
if gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^q") else -- acSendKeys("{PGUP}") end

acMouseClick(gex, gey, 2, 1, 1)
acSendKeys("{F_6}")

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
acMouseClick(gsx, gsy, 2, 1, 1) acMouseMove(gex, gey)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("21") acSendKeys("{ENTER}") else acSendKeys("{ESC}") end

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) or gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("+{F_5}") else -- / acMaximizeOrRestoreWindow(nil, gsx, gsy) end
acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("n") acSendKeys("sn")
acSendKeys("^d")

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy) local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^y") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^g") elseif gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^r") else -- acSendKeys(" ") end

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^z") elseif gsy > (bt - 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^+g") elseif gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^l") else -- acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end

local rt = acGetWindowRight(nil, gsx, gsy) local aw = rt / 4
if gex > (rt - aw) then -- 1/4 acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("w") acSendKeys("m") else -- acSendKeys("^f") end

local rt = acGetWindowRight(nil, gsx, gsy) local aw = rt / 4
if gex < aw then -- 1/4 acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("m") acSendKeys("c") end
acSendKeys("^h")

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("%{RIGHT}") end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("%{LEFT}") end
acSendKeys("+^{PLUS}")
acSendKeys("+^-")

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) or gey < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^l") else -- / acMaximizeOrRestoreWindow(nil, gsx, gsy) end
if gey > 80 then -- Ctrl + W acSendKeys("^w") else -- acSendKeys("%{F_4}") end
-- / acSendKeys("^{F_1}")

local exe = acGetExecutableName(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gey < 80 then -- if exe == "EXCEL.EXE" then -- Excel acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("h") acSendKeys("ac") else acSendKeys("^e") -- Word/PowerPoint end else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^c") end
acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^%v")
if gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^u") else -- acSendKeys("^b") end

local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^i") else -- acSendKeys("^x") end

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy) local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gey < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^y") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("jd") acSendKeys("ag") acSendKeys("g") elseif gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^r") else -- acSendKeys(" ") end

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^z") elseif gsy > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("jd") acSendKeys("ag") acSendKeys("u") elseif gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("^l") else -- acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end

local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acSendKeys("{F_9}") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("^a") else -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^v") end

--
local t = acGetWindowTitle(nil, gsx, gsy)
if t == "" or t == "" or t == "" or t == "" or t == "" or t == "" or string.find(t, "") ~= nil or string.find(t, "") ~= nil or string.find(t, "") ~= nil then acSendKeys("%{F_4}") else acSendKeys("^w") end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy) local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy) local rt = acGetMonitorRight(acGetMonitorFromPoint(gsx, gsy), 1)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^y") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("h") acSendKeys("m") acSendKeys("m") elseif gex > (rt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("h") acSendKeys("ar") else -- acSendKeys(" ") end

local tp = acGetWindowTop(nil, gsx, gsy) local bt = acGetWindowBottom(nil, gsx, gsy)
if gsy < (tp + 80) then -- acDisplayBalloonTip("StrokesPlus", "", 1) acSendKeys("^z") elseif gey > (bt - 80) then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("h") acSendKeys("m") acSendKeys("u") elseif gex < 80 then -- acSendKeys("%") acSendKeys("h") acSendKeys("al") else -- acSendKeys("{BACKSPACE}") end
if gey > 80 then -- Ctrl + F4 acSendKeys("^{F_4}") else -- acSendKeys("%{F_4}") end
if gey > 80 then -- Ctrl + W acSendKeys("^w") else -- acSendKeys("%{F_4}") end
